livecodesAboutPara1.translation: <1><0>LiveCodes</0></1> is an <2>open-source</2>, <3>feature-rich</3>, <4>client-side</4> code playground. Currently, <6>80+ languages/<5></5>frameworks</6> are supported. It can be used as a standalone app or can be <7>embedded</7> in any web page. There are many ways to <8>prefill playgrounds</8> with code.

livecodesAboutPara2.translation: A wide range of <0>configuration options</0> makes it very flexible. A powerful <1>SDK</1> (for <2>JS/TS</2>, <3>React</3>, <4>Vue</4> and <5>Svelte</5>) facilitates <6>embedding</6> and <7>communicating</7> with playgrounds. <8>Comprehensive documentations</8> are available with code samples, live demos and screenshots.
